participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, Emma enjoys nature and seeks meaningful connections with others.
participant_1.background: I am a vegetarian. I am afraid of clowns. I take the subway to work every day. Every fall I visit my sister in Canada.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, Jake often finds joy in simple pleasures and has a relaxed approach to life.
participant_2.background: I try to limit how much I eat. I whine a lot. I hate paying my bills. I do not have a job and sit on the couch all day.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for fun?
I like to watch movies and play video games.
Me too! What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like action movies and comedies.
I love action movies too! I'm not a big fan of comedies, though.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play role-playing games and action-adventure games.
I'm not very good at video games, but I like to play them anyway.
That's okay! I'm not very good at them either, but I still have a lot of fun.
What else do you like to do?
I like to read, go for walks, and visit my sister in Canada.
I like to read too! I'm not very active, so I don't go for walks very often.
That's okay! I like to go for walks because I like to get some exercise.
I understand. I'm not very good at exercise either.
That's okay! We can do it together.
That sounds like fun! I'm always up for a challenge.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free to go for a walk.
Okay! I'll be waiting.
